abstract: After another week of intense discussions, the Google-Yahoo advertising partnership isn’t dead yet.
snippet: After another week of intense discussions, the Google-Yahoo advertising partnership isn’t dead yet.
lead_paragraph: It’s been no secret that the advertising partnership between Google and Yahoo is in a great deal of trouble. The Justice Department, which has been investigating the deal for weeks, has raised concerns about its effect on competition. The companies have agreed to postpone its implementation multiple times, to give regulators more time to finish their investigation, and to see if they can reach a compromise that would address those concerns.

headline.main: Google-Yahoo Ad Deal Remains in Limbo
